author: Special Correspondent
text:
Several trains would be terminated at Tenkasi railway station instead of Shencottah from Friday to Monday as the railway would take up yard remodelling work at Shencottah railway station.

The following trains would be terminated at Tenkasi on Friday: Train No. 56735 Madurai– Shencottah passenger (scheduled to leave Madurai at 5.15 p.m.) and Train No. 56799 Tirunelveli– Shencottah passenger (scheduled to leave Tirunelveli at 6.20 p.m.

Train trains to be terminated on Saturday and Sunday are: Train No. 12661 Chennai Egmore– Shencottah Podhigai Express; Train No. 56731 Madurai– Sengottai passenger trains (scheduled to leave Madurai at 7.15 a.m; 11.25 a.m; and 5.15 p.m.); Train No. 56801 Tirunelveli– Shencottah passenger trains (scheduled to leave Tirunelveli at 6.45 a.m; 9.25 a.m., 1.50 p.m. and 6.20 p.m.). These trains in the opposite direction would originate from Tenkasi on Saturday and Sunday

Origination from Tenkasi on Monday : Train No. 56796 Shencottah– Tirunelveli passenger scheduled to leave Shencottah at 6.45 a.m. will leave from Tenkasi, and Train No. 56732 Shencottah– Madurai passenger scheduled to leave Shencottah at 7 a.m. will leave from Tenkasi.

Meanwhile, railway administration has made arrangements for road bridging between Tenkasi and Shencottah during this period. Passengers holding reserved tickets and other genuine passengers can avail themselves of bus services to be operated by Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation, according to a railway statement.
title: Trains to be terminated at Tenkasi till Monday
